Name: Ceydy Yorleny
description:
She lives with her family. She works in agriculture as her principal source of income. She grows coffee of good quality because she provides adequate care to later sell at an excellent price. She is very responsible with her crops
and likes to give excellent maintenance.

She requests the loan to buy fertilizer and mulch for her crops, to achieve very good production. She is very pleased with the kindness and good treatment received from Prisma and Kiva. She is very grateful for the support received. Her dream is to have good production.

December 2023.
